entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50

RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 50
